E-Mail Messages
Date: Friday, 6/20/1978
Subject: Jim Hardin healing process
Jim Hardin is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Monday, 7/14/1978
Subject: Progress of Rick Lisi
Dear Sir,
Rick Lisi is hitting the ball well at A Lynchburg Mets!
He has an AVG of .317, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
